answers.answer: Is it 6 monthes post treatment already? If this is the case I am very happy for you. Congratulations!!

Isn't it just like him to not want to use a thread for that. I had to read it over at hotheps.MIKE- I left you a message on a different thread (federal funding)earlier, but will never get tired of saying "CONGRATULATIONS...You slayed another dragon" I am so happy for you. Thanks for everything you have done not only for me but for all those that you have helped here.

I am soo happy for you!!  I just sent you mail, but would like to congratulate you here as well..  You have been such a wonderful support to so many of us here at MedHelp that I would like to be one of the first to say CONGRATULATIONS!!!! I just knew everything would turn out fine and it did, the waiting game can be torture at times, but in your case, well worth it...Please keep in touch.We Love You!Jodi & Amanda
Such good news!!!!
It's wonderful to see you "old-timers" doing well. It makes my week!Since I can only check the forum at work for awhile, if any of you want to e-mail me, ***@**** , I would love it.   Joni

Hello, again, Mike,So how are you dealing with this?  Are you cautiosly watching, or quietly celebrating?  When you're SVR at 6 months (that will come soon, too), does that mean the same thing for you as those w/o a transplant?  I sure hope so.You've been such a friend here; always ready with a kind word, always informed; always supporting us, even when you were down.  I'm really happy your time has come, too.  May Hepatitis be mere history in your life from now on.I'm setting off a firework in your honor tomorrow night.  I hope you can see it from where you are!Maj Neni
I said it down on another thread. I just wish you the best Mike you are just greatGOD BLESSBob L
Congratulations !!! Great news:)
Congratulations on your great news. You have my very best wishes for continued good health and much happiness.Susan
Congratulations !!! Great news:)

I FINALLY get my computer restored enough to get back here and what's the first thing I see??  You are clear at 3 months??WOO HOO!!!  AWSOME NEWS!!! This is truely a miracle that we all have hoped for.The timing looks like you may be looking at the bestest Christmas present of all!!You have been such a valuable part of this whole community for so long. And I see that you continue to be. Majneni is ALWAYS looking for any excuse to play with explosives. This gives her a good reason. At your 6 month test I imagine she'll pull out the C-4 !! I'll start gettin your seat ready over by her on the SVR bus. Just bring some earplugs and eye protection. HahahahahaCongratulations Mike.
MikeWonderful news !!  You are winning and you deserve it !!  Way to GO !!~dtr.
AWESOME NEWS!!!!!!
Congrats! You are an inspiration to all of us!!

So happy for you Mike.  You've been around here a long time despite your own medical drama that seemed far more extensive and sinister than anything we were dealing with.  But you always found time and compassion to encourage others to keep fighting HepC.  A true and deserving warrior.
Mike,Congratulations!!!You have been an inspiration to all of us and always had words of encouragement for people on this forum. I can not wait to hear about SVR for you!Foreign girl.
a big thumbs up mikesimon...nono not up mikesimon...for mikesimoncongrats man

You guys are the greatest! Thanks to all of you for your kind well wishes. I just hope I don't disappoint you with another relapse but for the first time I am guardedly optimistic. I had all but one of the negative predictors for beating this thing: genotype 1, male, over 45 years of age, high load (6.5 miliion IU/ML), transplant recipient and diabetic. The one neagtive predictor that I didn't have was cirrhosis so if I do get lucky and become an SVR I hope this will give some people a bit more hope. I can't express how much it means that you are rooting for me and have such nice things to say about me. I don't honestly feel that I deserve this type of regard but I'll wrap it around me and allow it to keep me warm and strong for the duration of the waiting game that we all are forced to play. Thanks again to all of you and I wish you all the very best. Be well. MikeIndiana; How is your wife doing? You may have posted and I missed it but I have been concerned and would love an update.

Just Got The News & Wanted To Personally Congratulate You!You Are An Absolute Inspiration To Us All...I Want To Thank-You For Your Encouragement & Support To Your Fellow Heppers.... May God Bless You & Your Family...You Will Be Forever Engraved Upon Our Hearts!Way To Go... & Again... Congratulations!!!Live Long, Love Much, Laugh Often...Keep The Faith, & May You & Your Family Prosper Spiritually As Well  As In All Other Aspects!!!!Ms_Vicki :)
Mike,Congratulations on the great news! You deserve it.  You have been an enormous help to the rest of us here on the board.May your next test show SVR!TS

question: Mike, obviously you did not want to take up a thread to spread your news.  I have no such compunction.  I am so happy for you!!  If anyone deserves to win this fight it is you.  You have been a voice of support, compassion, and reason.  You have been friend, comforter, adviser, referee, and peacemaker.  Thank you, thank you, thank you and congratulations!!!!
title: HOORAY FOR MIKESIMON
